game.name: DraQu: Elemental Awakening
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 친구들과 즐기는 협동 게임. 새 게임이 계속 추가되며, 공유 진행도와 게임 간 보상으로 연결됩니다. 무엇을 하든, 어디서든 성장하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A co-op game for friends. New games added over time, linked by shared progression and cross-game rewards. Play anything, progress everywhere.
